title: Ticket #677: Grand unified param() breaks subsys.local.param and local.param
description:
It looks like the "grand unified configuration" / param work breaks the local configuration priorities. For example: 

FOO       = abc
LOCAL.FOO = def

When MYDAEMON, started with "-local-name LOCAL", when the daemon params for FOO, it gets "abc", not "def"

The debug and locality information is a bit messed up if you define scoped things in the default param table concerning the extra_info hash table. It can be fixed later.
